title: Aliens vs Keen
content:
Well, I'm pretty sure this mod is all debugged [Five beta testers, ONE gets back to me!] So here it is:

[url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/AliensvsKeen.zip]levellord.toxicsheep.com/...vsKeen.zip[/url]

This mod comes in both english and german translations, both with theme songs. There is some 1337 art by DivoKeen [and Djaser, and some by me too] Djaser also helped translate, so if there's any problems or offensive words, its his fault.

It may be possible that you can't complete the mod on your computer, if this is the case, run error.Bat; this will finnish the mod when you complete any level.

Do tell me how it is, problems and etc!

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Aliens vs Keen
content:
I love aliens, and the small amount I've had time to play the beta has been great. Check it out!

PS. I moved this topic to releases forum..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Aliens vs Keen
content:
My help influence on the graphics was small, I redrew some stuff.
The loading screen, Chestburster, and the alien eggs are my most important contributions. I would like to know what you all thing of them.

Anyway, good job LL on completing the mod, especially the alien egg patching work I loved that.-----------------

title: Re: Aliens vs Keen
content:
Sorry. I was too busy playing it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

I didn't want to comment until I got far enough to say something informed, but if you must know, I like it a lot. I especially like the tileset. I'm not really wild about the Aliens theme, but it's a good solid mod. It's fun how the levels feel deep underground.________________

title: Re: Aliens vs Keen

title: Re: Aliens vs Keen
content: Hah, I'd completely forgotten about this one. I started playing it back when it was released, but must've become distracted by other things. I'll add it to my DOS Beast's menu alongside A New Dope and get back to playing it.
